!!! error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'Array'.

==== esDecorators-classDeclaration-methods-nonStatic.ts (0 errors) ====
    declare let dec: any;
    
    const method3 = "method3";
    
    class C {
        @dec(1) method1() {}
        @dec(2) ["method2"]() {}
        @dec(3) [method3]() {}
    }
